block.p: Hilary Jane Guberman, the daughter of Dr. Sandra Guberman and Irving Guberman of New York, is to be married today to Jeffrey Pohlman, a son of Margaret Conwell of Bozeman, Mont., and Dolphy O. Pohlman of Butte, Mont. Rabbi Roger Ross is to officiate at the Yale Club in New York.

Ms. Guberman, 31, is the programming and project manager of Centerseat, an Internet commerce and content provider based in New York. She graduated from Vassar College. Her father, who retired as an account executive at the Arrow Art Company, a display manufacturing company in the Bronx, now teaches math at City as School, an alternative high school in Manhattan. Her mother, who retired as a social worker for the New York City Board of Education, has a private psychotherapy practice in New York.

Hilary Jane Guberman, the daughter of Dr. Sandra Guberman and Irving Guberman of New York, is to be married today to Jeffrey Pohlman, a son of Margaret Conwell of Bozeman, Mont., and Dolphy O. Pohlman of Butte, Mont. Rabbi Roger Ross is to officiate at the Yale Club in New York.

Ms. Guberman, 31, is the programming and project manager of Centerseat, an Internet commerce and content provider based in New York. She graduated from Vassar College. Her father, who retired as an account executive at the Arrow Art Company, a display manufacturing company in the Bronx, now teaches math at City as School, an alternative high school in Manhattan. Her mother, who retired as a social worker for the New York City Board of Education, has a private psychotherapy practice in New York.

Mr. Pohlman, 31, is a segment producer in New York for ''CNN & Time,'' a weekly television news magazine show. He graduated from New York University. His mother is a nutritionist and manages the WIC program in Bozeman, a nutritional, and pre- and postnatal referral program for families with children, which is funded by the Agriculture Department. His father is a senior partner in Corette, Pohlman & Kebe, a law firm in Butte.
